thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 7 of 122
thread.title: Claire Gervin

author: Claire Gervin
title: Claire Gervin
text:
Can't recommend this company highly enough, we dealt with Carla Smith for our travel arrangements and what a wonderful service we received, she took care of everything for our first trip to Orlando and it was fantastic, the villa she recommended was exceptional, the car hire company was great, the flights with Virgin Atlantic were spot on, the excursions were amazing! Carla was at the end of the phone anytime we needed advice.
Would definitely use again, thank you for a wonderful holiday ðŸ˜€
